author: rjung
msg: Also check local to global error escalation
Add debug logging to both places where we escalate.

author: awiner
msg: - Add support for ${Msg} variable in server-side templates, including recursive EL execution

author: rjung
msg: Use new attribute error_escalation_time to decide,
whether an unspecified local error should be
escalated to a global error. Decision is based on
how long we already have a local error.

author: rjung
msg: Add new attribute error_escalation_time to structures,
initialize and add to pull and push.
